text: I did the best I could, and in some arenas, my best was not good enough. I've made some bad choices.
author: Amy Grant

text: Those men get along best with women who can get along best without them.
author: Charles Baudelaire

text: In our so-called democracy we are accustomed to give the majority what they want rather than educate them to understand what is best for them.
author: Carter G. Woodson

text: It is our best work that God wants, not the dregs of our exhaustion. I think he must prefer quality to quantity.
author: George MacDonald

text: I was blessed with certain gifts and talents and God gave them to me to be the best person I can be and to have a positive impact on other people.
author: Bryan Clay
